column1: samADi saMBAra parivartaH lokanATAya namaH
column2: @134b # // rgya gar skad du /sa m'a dhi sambha ra ba ri brta / bod skad du / ting nge 'dzin tshogs kyi le'u / 'jig rten mgon po la phyag 'tshal lo // dang po'i snying rje'i stobs las byung //

column1: boDi cittam dRXam kuryAt pUrva kAruNya Sakti jam
column2: rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems brtan bya //

column1: Bava Boga suKe saktaH parigraha parAFmuKaH
column2: srid pa'i longs spyod bde ma chags // yongs su 'dzin pa rgyab kyis phyogs // dad sogs nor ni phun sum tshogs //

column1: SradDA Adi Dana sampannaH gurum budDa samam Bajet
column2: bla ma sangs rgyas dang mnyam gus //

column1: tat dizwa samaya AcAram paripAlitum udyataH
column2: des bstan dam tshig spyod pa ni // yongs su bskyang la rab tu brtson //

column1: kumBa guhya aBa izekam tu prasAdAt laBate guroH
column2: bum pa gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba // bla ma'i drin gyis yongs su thob //

column1: kAya vAc citta saMSudDaH sidDipAtram sa sADakaH
column2: lus ngag sems ni rnam @135a * // dag pa'i // sgrub pa po de dngos grub snod //

column1: samADi aFga samudBUta saMBAra pAripUritaH SIGram sidDi AptiH evam ca guhya mantra naya sTitiH
column2: ting 'dzin yan lag las byung ba'i // tshogs ni yongs su rdzogs pa # // rgya gar skad du / sa m'a dhi sambha ra ba ri brta / bod tshul gnas yin // ting 'dzin yan lag nyams gyur cing //

column1: samADi aFga cyutO tasya vipakza sTititaH taTA
column2: de yi mi mthun phyogs gnas na //

column1: janma kowi sahasrEH ca samADiH na prasiDyati
column2: skye ba bye ba stong gis kyang // ting 'dzin rab tu grub mi 'gyur // ting nge 'dzin ni rab grub phyir //

column1: tad samADi prasiDi arTa guhya vRtta sTa yoga vid
column2: gsang sngags spyod gnas rnal 'byor bas //

column1: tat Binnam cintanam tyaktvA dRXa vIryeNa ca udyamet
column2: de las gzhan pa'i sems spangs te // g-yeng med brtson pas 'bad par bya //

column1: samADeH yAni ca aFgAni vipakzaH tad viniScaye
column2: ting nge 'dzin gyi yan lag dang // mi mthun phyogs gang nges bya'i phyir //

column1: samADi aFgam vipakzaH ca saMkzepeNa samucyate
column2: ting 'dzin yan lag mi mthun phyogs // de ni mdor bsdus nas bshad bya //

column1: SIla sampatti yukta tvam Bogezu nirapekzatA
column2: tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa dang // longs spyod rnams la ltos med nyid //

column1: kzAntiH dRXa pratijQA ca jana saMsarga varjanam
column2: bzod ldan dam bca' brtan pa dang // skye bo 'du 'dzi rnam par spang //

column1: kAya vAc citta kAryezu samprajanya samanvayaH
column2: lus dang ngag yid las rnams la //

column1: budDa kAya stuti smRtyA kAya anusmRti saMyutiH
column2: shes bzhin dang ni ldan pa dang // sangs rgyas skur 'dogs dran pa yi // lus kyi rjes dran yang dag ldan //

column1: yasmin kAle tu yat kArya dArXrya tasya hi anusmRtO
column2: dus gang du ni bya ba yi //

column1: paQca AvaraNa hAniH ca yukta kRt Baktam Ana tA
column2: rjes dran de la brtan pa dang // sgrib pa lnga ni spang ba dang // zas kyi tshod rig spyod lam ran//

column1: samasta loka Darmezu citta upekzA sadA taTA
column2: 'jig rten chos ni thams cad la // rtag tu sems ni btang snyoms dang // yo byad bsnyungs 'di yan lag ste //

column1: saMleKaH FgAni ca imAni vipakzaH tad viparyayaH samADi samBAra kRtEH hi puNyEH samADim vajra upamam etu lokaH   a ba
column2: go bzlog pa ni mi mthun phyogs //

column1: samADi samBAra parivartaH mahA paNxita AcArya dIpaFkara SrI jQAna pAda viracitaH samAptaH
column2: ting 'dzin tshogs kyi le'u bkod pa'i bsod nams des // 'gro bas ting 'dzin rdo rje lta bu thob par shog / ting nge 'dzin gyi tshogs kyi le'u slob dpon mkhas pa chen po dpal mar me mdzad ye shes kyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so //
